Starting April 4, Page will assume the role of CEO and will also lead product development and technology strategy, which Eric Schmidt said are his greatest strengths. He added that

Page replaces Google CEO Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said Page would merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. Mr Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves.
